column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Only problem was the service. The busers
column3: and other staff were super friendly and helpful
column4: except for our waiter Tony. Tony started the evening by neglecting to greet us for about 15-20 minutes
column5: and when he finally reaches us
column6: told us he was struggling with 4 tables and very busy. I understand Friday nights can be hectic
column7: but this behavior continued. We gave him out order immediately
column8: since we had read the menu thoroughly
column9: but it took him about 20 more minutes to bring us water! He apologized for that as well
